Params: {3: '"Since then... and how long has it been? Anyway—I have not heard about him anymore."'}
{3: '"Not that I have any proof... but I can\'t shake the feeling that, for someone who was so hellbent on getting what he wanted, he must still be out there somewhere."'}
{3: '"But if I ever see him again..."'}
{3: '"I\'m so going to beat the shit out of him."'}
{2: 'Changyu', 3: "What's the matter with you? How come you don't make any sound when you walk?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Sophia', 3: 'Two minutes late. Reporting to the leader.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Changyu', 3: "Kids these days... What's wrong with being a little bit late?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Changyu', 3: '...You must be misremembering. I never said that.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'In the split second when Sophia turns around, Changyu grabs the journal on his desk and shoves it inside a drawer.'}
{3: "I will never be sure what I'd choose if I'd been offered the choice to leave or stay on the Nighter back then."}
{3: "I wonder if he'd just seen through me, or did he simply decide to choose for me?"}
{3: "Either way, that was when I found out who I am. I gained the freedom I'd earned, despite it coming in woeful shades of grey."}
{3: "Whatever the truth is, I will not stop seeking my past... And I will gain the strength I'm after."}
{3: 'This... This is just the beginning of my story.'}
{3: 'What Changyu never found out is that Huainan did make a comprehensive escape plan for this scenario. Not that it concerns Changyu anymore.'}
{3: 'Huainan formulated four escape plans. The first one was sending out distress calls—'}
{3: 'He had sent out countless distress signals with information on the Nighter, messages that had remained on radio frequency unanswered—intel that will one day be intercepted by "421."'}
{3: 'His second plan was to forcefully remove his collar, which caused the horrid red scars on his neck.'}
{3: 'His third plan was to be traded away as merchandise.'}
{3: 'His fourth plan was to be removed by way of execution, a punishment for a crime he might just commit.'}
{3: 'A dangerous gambit that leaves no loose ends.'}
{3: 'Waves crash onto the shore, washing over the sandy, rocky coast. And as the water recedes, lying on top of the coarse sand is the tender frame of a young person.'}
